TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRawElementProviderFragmentRoot implements class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment, class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple

summary.span: 公開在片段中根項目的方法與屬性。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties on the root element in a fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在架構; 中的根項目所實作這個介面例如，清單方塊視窗中。This interface is implemented by a root element within a framework; for example, a list box within a window. 在同一個片段中，例如清單項目，其他項目實作介面。Other elements in the same fragment, such as list items, implement the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment ElementProviderFromPoint(float64 x, float64 y) cil managed
Public Function ElementProviderFromPoint (x As Double, y As Double) As IRawElementProviderFragment

summary.span: 擷取位於指定點之這個片段中的項目。

span.span: Retrieves the element in this fragment that is at the specified point.

returns.span: 在指定點上子項目的提供者 (如果有的話)，或如果該點在此項目上，而不是在任何子項目上，則為根提供者。

span.span: The provider for the child element at the specified point, if one exists, or the root provider if the point is on this element but not on any child element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果點是在另一個架構，由這個片段中的項目，則方法會傳回裝載該片段的項目。If the point is on an element in another framework that is hosted by this fragment, the method returns the element that hosts that fragment. 傳回提供者應該對應至接收指定點上的滑鼠輸入的項目。The returned provider should correspond to the element that would receive mouse input at the specified point. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範一個可能的實作，這個方法針對非捲動清單方塊。The following code example shows one possible implementation of this method for a non-scrolling list box. 位於指定點的清單項目的索引計算使用高度的每個項目，並在該點傳回的項目。The index of the list item at the specified point is calculated using the height of each item, and the item at that point is returned. 如果此時沒有任何項目 (例如，這是清單方塊的空白區域，方法會傳回 null 參考 (`Nothing`)。If no item exists at that point (for example, it is a blank area of the list box, the method returns a null reference (`Nothing`). [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListFragment.vb#106)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment GetFocus() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取這個片段中具有輸入焦點的項目。

span.span: Retrieves the element in this fragment that has the input focus.

returns.span: 具有輸入焦點之片段中項目的提供者 (如果有的話)，否則會傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: The provider for the element in this fragment that has the input focus, if any; otherwise, a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果焦點是另一個架構，由這個片段中的項目，則方法會傳回裝載該片段的項目。If the focus is on an element in another framework that is hosted by this fragment, the method returns the element that hosts that fragment. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範一個可能的實作，這個方法的清單方塊。The following code example shows one possible implementation of this method for a list box. 它會傳回目前選取的項目在清單中。It returns the currently selected item in the list. [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#107)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListFragment.vb#107)]
